alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox; Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 13 at 10:39AM EDT until March 16 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... White River at Hazleton. Wabash River at Vincennes. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Wabash River at Mount Carmel. Wabash River at Terre Haute. Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. Wabash River at Riverton. .Minor flooding is ongoing across western and southwestern Indiana. Flooding is expected to continue on the lower White through Tuesday and along the Wabash through Thursday. The crest on the Wabash is near Vincennes with river levels along the White river falling along the full length of the river. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Mount Carmel. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.9 feet, Water begins to flow over River Road just north of Fifth Street in the Mount Carmel area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Monday /10:00 AM EDT Monday/ the stage was 22.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM CDT Monday /10:00 AM EDT Monday/ was 22.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday evening and continue falling to 6.7 feet Thursday, March 23. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
